resources.string: Home Lists two groups, played recently and newly added songs, clicking on a song starts playing it
My Library Lists all albums (folders that has mp3 files) found in the device, clicking on a folder lists all songs found in that folder and clicking on a song starts playing it
Now playing shows information about the song (artist name, name of the album ,year , and the name of the folder saved in) and has playControls
Search activity contains editText for the search key to be typed, typing text in the editText lists the Results found, clicking on a songs starts playing it
Has instructions on how to use the application
